sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.KBCatTablesSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Provides list of available knowledge category parent tables. Currently restricted to "kb_category" and "kb_knowledge_base".  Customers should not change this class directly This class is never called directly.</description>
        <name>KBCatTablesSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var KBCatTablesSNC = Class.create();

KBCatTablesSNC.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
    
    process: function() {
        var result = [];
        var dict = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
        dict.addNullQuery("element");
        var gc = dict.addQuery("name", "kb_category");
        gc.addOrCondition("name", "kb_knowledge_base");
        dict.orderBy("name");
        dict.query();
        
        while (dict.next()) {
        	result.push("" + dict.name);
        }
       
        return result;
    }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-12-17 09:07:33</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8c03647bb712230026778d78ee11a947</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>KBCatTablesSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Knowledge Management Core" source="com.glideapp.knowledge">e011410f6d2620100acb70b353433002</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8c03647bb712230026778d78ee11a947</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-12-17 09:07:33</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>539</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
